com.grt192.core
Class Mechanism

java.lang.Object
  com.grt192.core.Mechanism
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArmAlpha, ArmBeta, BallShooter, GRTDriverStation, GRTRobotBase, TestMechanism
public abstract class Mechanism
extends Object

A container for a set of actuators and sensors that are in a robot part.

Author:
anand
